attributes.action: Stop Paypal feezing customer accounts, just to stop withdrawals and they earn MEGA interest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paypal continually freeze accounts with over £1000 in credit, then ask for faxes etc to prove who your are, it then takes many emails, phone calls and months to get your acccount back on.
In the meantime you lose interest, business, customers Etc. and they rake it in making MEGA money on interest from money that is not theirs, they are not Government officials who have the right to stop you using your own money.Sign now to get the financial institute of the UK,EEC,EU  OR whoever to stop this THEFT OR YOUR MONEY.....

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
